info.description: Get and Management of Common references
info.title: Common APIs

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

parameters.name: today
parameters.description: Identifies the date of business being processed in the financial Instituion.

parameters.name: nextWorkingDay
parameters.description: This is the state of the next business day which will be processed in this Company.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

companyId.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

currentWorkingDate.description: Identifies the date of business being processed in the financial Instituion.

lastWorkingDate.description: Date of the last business day processed for the financial institution

nextWorkingDate.description: This is the state of the next business day which will be processed in this Company.

code.description: The identifier of the error message

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

countryId.description: The identifier of the country, normally the SWIFT code of the country.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

sellRate.description: The market sell rate of the transaction

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

lookupName.description: The name that is displayed for the lookup

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

lookupId.description: The identifier of the lookup. Used to specify lookup requests on virtual tables. See lookups
